lyrics: Cleansing my mindâ€™s mirror with the dust of the Guru's lotus feet.
I sing the pure glory of Lord Rama, which grants the four fruits of life.
Acknowledging my lack of wisdom, I remember Lord Hanuman.
Grant me strength, intelligence, and knowledge, and remove my sufferings and impurities.
Hail Hanuman, the ocean of knowledge and virtues
Hail the lord of the monkeys, who enlightens the three worlds
The messenger of Ram, whose power is unparalleled
The son of Anjani, also known as the son of the wind god
Mahavir Vikram Bajrangi is the name of a form of Lord Hanuman.
One who is associated with good wisdom and thought, and protects from bad thoughts.
One who has a golden complexion and is adorned with wealth and beauty.
One who wears earrings and has curly hair.
A thunderbolt and a flag adorn your hands.
A sacred thread made of Munj grass decorates your shoulder.
You are the son of Lord Shiva and Kesari.
Your splendor and valor are great, and the world worships you.
The one who is full of knowledge and virtues, and is very clever
The one who is very eager to perform the tasks of Ram
The one who delights in listening to the stories of the Lord
The one whose mind is absorbed in Ram, Lakshman, and Sita
Lord Ram assumed a subtle form and showed it to Sita Mata.
Lord Ram assumed a fierce form and burned Lanka down.
Lord Ram assumed a mighty form and destroyed the demons.
Lord Ram completed His work successfully.
Brought the life-saving herb and revived Lakshman
Lord Rama joyfully embraced Lakshman
Lord Rama praised you highly
You are as dear to me as my brother Bharat
Your glory is sung by your thousands of faces
The Lord says this and embraces you
Sanak and other sages along with Brahma praise you
Narad, Saraswati and other deities sing your praises
As far as Yama, Kuber, and the guardians of the directions have their authority, to that extent.
No poet or scholar can say where they can reach.
You did a favor to Sugreev.
Lord Ram gave Sugreev the royal position.
Bibhishan followed your mantra
Became the king of Lanka, known to all
The sun situated thousands of yojanas away
Swallowed it thinking it a sweet fruit
The Lord crossed the ocean by placing His ring in His mouth
There was no surprise in crossing the ocean
All the difficult tasks in the world become easy by your grace
By your grace, all difficult tasks become easy
You are the guardian at the door of Lord Ram.
Without permission, nothing can be done.
All happiness is attained by taking refuge in You.
You are the protector, no one needs to fear.
You can control your own strength.
Your roar makes the three worlds tremble.
Ghosts and spirits do not come near you.
When the name of Mahaveer is uttered.
All diseases and sufferings are removed by chanting the name of Lord Hanuman continuously
Those who chant Lord Hanuman's name continuously, face no obstacles in life
Lord Hanuman frees his devotees from all kinds of troubles
One who meditates on Lord Hanuman with mind, word, and action, attains success
Lord Ram's blessings are upon all, He is a meditative king.
You make all their works successful.
Whoever comes with a wish or desire.
That person attains eternal fruit in life.
Your glory is prevalent in all four ages.
The world is illuminated by your fame.
You are the protector of saints and sages.
Slayer of demons, beloved of Lord Ram.
The giver of the eight siddhis and nine treasures is Mata Janaki
The one who rescues all the poor and needy souls, Mata Janaki
You possess the elixir of Lord Ram, which enriches the devotees
Always remain the servant of Lord Raghupati and serve him
Those who chant your praises attain Lord Ram.
They forget their sufferings of many lifetimes.
At the time of death, they go to the city of the Raghu dynasty.
Where the devotees of Hari are born.
No need to think about other deities
Hanuman grants all happiness
Troubles vanish and all sorrows are gone
Whoever remembers Hanuman the valiant
Hail, Hail, Hail, Lord Hanuman, the greatest devotee of Lord Ram!
Just as Guru Dev showers grace, may you shower grace as well
Whoever recites this mantra a hundred times will be freed from bondage
That person will attain great happiness and be freed from bondage
Whoever reads the Hanuman Chalisa attains the state of being a witness to Lord Gauri.
They become a witness to Lord Gauri and attain success.
Tulsidas always remains a servant of Lord Hari.
O Lord, make my heart your eternal dwelling.
The son of wind, Lord Hanuman, removes all obstacles and troubles.
He is the embodiment of auspiciousness and brings happiness.
With Ram, Lakshman, and Sita.
Reside in our hearts, O King of the gods.
